channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury Yields, Dollar Little Changed by Unsurprising PCE Data
item.description: Treasury yields remained lower after the latest round of U.S. economic data showed the Fed’s preferred inflation gauge rose in line with expectations.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed Ahead of PCE Inflation Report
item.description: U.S. stocks opened mixed ahead of a readout from the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation gauge. Tech stocks sold off following disappointing results...

item.title: Urban Outfitters’ stock on track for biggest gain in more than a year, as analysts sense a shift in tone

item.title: Treasury yields trim declines after PCE inflation reading edges up from Fed’s target
item.description: Treasury yields were trimming earlier declines after a barrage of pre-Thanksgiving economic data added to the case for gradual Fed rate cuts .
